about

minimize
Everyone has seen parenthesis, but they haven’t seen it on THAT SIDE of the method. Thats crazy!
-- Rich Hickey
-- Piotr Peel Limanowski
Java/Scala dev, AOSP hacker

Software Engineering professional with creative talent, analytical abilities, great people skills and passion. Appreciated team worker and eager to work in new technologies new-experience-seeker. Always paying attention to detail open-source enthusiast and commiter.

Particularly interested and experienced in development and integration of distributed, 3/n-tier software development. Always interested in mobile-platform software development. Currently working as a developer & architect. An active member of development team on development and design of SOA services.

BTW, This site is not a blog nor personal portfolio but merely a bunch of notes. I am glad if you find it somewhat interesting but please do not consider this as any of the above.
